name: Phalanx (itch)
description:
Have you ever wondered what is it like to not only to recruit the real “heroes” but also to fight with the traders, innkeeper, and the village old man in a RPG? In this game you can do that! Depends on which characters you recruit, you will experience different story lines. While building up your team, you will be facing various choices which will affect the game play. There won’t be any mandatory story lines nor long dialogues that I know most of you are going to skip through, But there is the freedom of making your own choices and play this game anyway you want. 

To sum it up, there is no right way to play Phalanx, there is only your way to play the game!
